xpath.div: × Como primer paso, ingresa a detalles y completa tu información.

row mt-3 bg-white border rounded rounded-lg
col-md-3 bg-info d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center py-3

div.div:
Gender*
Select Gender Male Female
N/A

div.label: VAT Number
div.small: Changing VAT number is not allowed once document(s) have been issued for your account. Please contact us directly for this operation.

Changing company name or VAT number is not allowed once document(s) have been issued for your account.
Please contact us directly for this operation.

div.div:
Marital status*
Marital status... Single Widower Married Divorced Cohabitant

Education Level*
Select Education Level WITHOUT FORMAL EDUCATION INCOMPLETE SPECIAL EDUCATION COMPLETE SPECIAL EDUCATION INCOMPLETE PRIMARY EDUCATION COMPLETE PRIMARY EDUCATION INCOMPLETE SECONDARY EDUCATION COMPLETE SECONDARY EDUCATION INCOMPLETE TECHNICAL EDUCATION COMPLETE TECHNICAL EDUCATION INCOMPLETE HIGHER EDUCATION(HIGHER INSTITUTE, ETC) COMPLETE HIGHER EDUCATION(HIGHER INSTITUTE, ETC) INCOMPLETE UNIVERSITARY EDUCATION COMPLETE UNIVERSITARY EDUCATION BACHELOR DEGREE TITLED INCOMPLETE STUDIES OF MASTER COMPLETE STUDIES OF MASTER MASTER DEGREE COMPLETE DOCTORAL STUDIES INCOMPLETE DOCTORAL STUDIES DOCTORAL DEGREE

row bg-info text-white text-center py-2 mb-3 rounded

t.small: If you choose “Private Pension System”, select if it's your first job or if coming from ONP.

div.t-attf-class: row g-3 mb-3 {{ 'd-none' if not (private_pension_system or partner.private_pension_system) else '' }}

div.class: row mt-3 bg-white border rounded rounded-lg
row bg-info text-white text-center py-2 mb-3 rounded

div.h5: Ingreso de Quinta Categoría por Otros Empleadores

input.name: fifth_category_income
input.t-att-checked: 'checked' if (partner and partner.fifth_category_income == False) else None

div.label: NO: No he percibido remuneraciones de quinta categoría(*) en el presente año de otro(s) empleador(es).

input.name: fifth_category_income
input.t-att-checked: 'checked' if (partner and partner.fifth_category_income == True) else None

div.label: SÍ: He percibido remuneraciones de quinta categoría(*) en el presente año de otro(s) empleador(es).

input.t-att-checked: 'checked' if (partner and partner.fifth_category_income == False) else None

div.label: NO: No he percibido remuneraciones de quinta categoría(*) en el presente año de otro(s) empleador(es).

input.t-att-checked: 'checked' if (partner and partner.fifth_category_income == True) else None

div.label: SÍ: He percibido remuneraciones de quinta categoría(*) en el presente año de otro(s) empleador(es).

div.p: (*)Incluye participación de utilidades, liquidación de beneficios sociales, reintegros de remuneración y otros conceptos remunerativos.

div.class: row mt-3 bg-white border rounded rounded-lg
row d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center py-2 mb-2

div.p: Are you sure you want to submit the information?
Por favor, completa todos los campos marcados en rojo antes de continuar.
Hay información obligatoria que falta ingresar.
